attributes.action: block the application to erect a Ferris Wheel in front of our flats.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British Waterways are proposing to erect a Ferris Wheel outside our flats from June to August 2009.  They will be running the Wheel from 8am to 8pm 7 days a week.  This will cause disruption to our way of living, affect out privacy and reduce the value of our propertes.
